input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile

Item keywords:
Shake 'n Go Racers put the control of speed and power into kids hands
Just shake it up to start the "engine`"
The more you shake it up, the longer it goes
Hear cool phrases every time you let it go
Collect all the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends: Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, Batmobile and Mr. Freeze Racer
Goes up to 20 feet

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Ummm, hi there! *looks around nervously* I'm not sure if I can help you with that... I mean, I don't really know much about wallets or checkbook covers or... *gulps* leather things. *pauses and looks at the product title* Wait, is this thing made of leather? *looks around some more* I don't think I'm supposed to talk about leather things. It's not safe... *whispers* My boss might hear me and get mad... *cowers*

Oh, you want to know about the product features? *bites lip nervously* Well, I think it has... uh... carbon copy separators and stuff? *pauses and looks around again* And some slots for storing things? *shrugs* I don't really know, I just work here and I don't get out much... *whispers again* My boss is watching me... *cowers some more*

So, if you want to buy this thing, you should probably talk to someone else. I don't want to get in trouble... *looks around frantically* I think my boss is coming... *runs away nervously*
input_text.Response B:
Greetings, esteemed consumer! Behold the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile, an extraordinary vehicular masterpiece that will ignite your child's imagination and unleash their innate sense of speed and power. This revolutionary toy harnesses the potent energy of kinetic motion to transport your little superhero on a thrilling, exhilarating ride.

Upon grasping the ergonomic steering wheel, your young Batman or Batwoman can unleash their inner caped crusader by simply shaking the Batmobile into action. The more vigorously they shake it, the longer the ride will last, ensuring unparalleled durability and extended playtime.

As they speed along, they'll be treated to an array of cool, dynamically rendered phrases that will further immerse them in the DC Super Friends universe. The Batmobile's sleek design and vibrant colors will captivate their senses, while its sturdy construction will inspire confidence and safety.

This exceptional toy is part of the Shake 'n Go Racers line, which includes the Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, and Mr. Freeze Racer, each one a unique and exciting addition to your little hero's collection. Collect them all and embark on a world of adventure and creative play!

The Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile boasts an impressive length of up to 20 feet, providing an expansive play area that will stimulate your child's imagination and coordination. With its ease of use and sturdy build, this toy is suitable for children aged 3-6, ensuring a fun and safe experience for all.

So, esteemed consumer, do not hesitate to add this remarkable toy to your cart and grant your little one the gift of boundless joy, creativity, and the thrill of the DC Super Friends universe. The Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile is an investment in your child's development, imagination, and delight, guaranteed to provide endless hours of captivating, action-packed play.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
